<small>Hebrew form: [[H4100]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָה‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָא‎</span> [[Ezra.6.8|Ezra 6:8]]) **pronoun interrogative** and **indefinite** ==what?== (Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָה‎</span>; Nabataean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מה‎</span>; Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מ‎</span>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מא‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: compare [[BDB#W|W]]<sup>CG 124 f.</sup>); — 

**1.** ***what*** ? [[Dan.4.32|Dan 4:32]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מה עבדת‎</span>. 

**2.** ***whatever, what*** (compare Biblical Hebrew **1 b** end) [[Dan.2.22|Dan 2:22]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ידע מח בחשׁוכא‎</span> knoweth ***what*** is in darkness, [[Ezra.6.9|Ezra 6:9]]: so <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָה דִּי‎</span> (compare <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דִּי‎</span> **1 b:** so Nabataean; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מא די‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מדי‎</span>, [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>306</sup> [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>320, 332</sup>) [[Dan.2.28|Dan 2:28]]; [[Dan.2.29|Dan 2:29]] (twice in verse); [[Dan.2.45|Dan 2:45]]; [[Ezra.6.8|Ezra 6:8]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎למא די תעבדון‎</span> with regard to ***what*** ye shall do, [[Ezra.7.18|Ezra 7:18]] (= ***whatsoever***). 

**3.** with prefixes: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּמָה‎</span> ***how!*** [[Dan.3.33|Dan 3:33]] (twice in verse). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְמָה‎</span> ***why?*** (compare Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לָמָּה‎</span>) [[Ezra.4.22|Ezra 4:22]] be not slack herein: ***why*** should damage grow, etc., virtually = ***lest*** damage grow ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">μή ποτε</span>), [[Ezra.7.23|Ezra 7:23]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎די למה להוא קצף‎</span> ***for why should there be wrath*** ? = ***lest*** [[[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">μή ποτε</span>] ***there be*** wrath (compare [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דִּילְמָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***lest:*** and see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָה‎</span> **4 d** ***b***, p. 554:a). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עלמֿה‎</span> ***wherefore***? [[Dan.2.15|Dan 2:15]].
